alif-lam-meem
ghulibati al-rūmu
fī adnā al-arḍi wahum min baʿdi ghalabihim sayaghlibūna
fī biḍ'ʿi sinīna lillahi al-amru min qablu wamin baʿdu wayawma-idhin yafraḥu al-mu'minūna
binaṣri al-lahi yanṣuru man yashāu wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-raḥīmu
waʿda al-lahi lā yukh'lifu al-lahu waʿdahu walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
yaʿlamūna ẓāhiran mina al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wahum ʿani al-ākhirati hum ghāfilūna
awalam yatafakkarū fī anfusihim mā khalaqa al-lahu al-samāwāti wal-arḍa wamā baynahumā illā bil-ḥaqi wa-ajalin musamman wa-inna kathīran mina al-nāsi biliqāi rabbihim lakāfirūna

awalam yasīrū fī al-arḍi fayanẓurū kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu alladhīna min qablihim kānū ashadda min'hum quwwatan wa-athārū al-arḍa waʿamarūhā akthara mimmā ʿamarūhā wajāathum rusuluhum bil-bayināti famā kāna al-lahu liyaẓlimahum walākin kānū anfusahum yaẓlimūna
thumma kāna ʿāqibata alladhīna asāū al-sūā an kadhabū biāyāti al-lahi wakānū bihā yastahziūna
al-lahu yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yuʿīduhu thumma ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
wayawma taqūmu al-sāʿatu yub'lisu al-muj'rimūna
walam yakun lahum min shurakāihim shufaʿāu wakānū bishurakāihim kāfirīna
wayawma taqūmu al-sāʿatu yawma-idhin yatafarraqūna
fa-ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fahum fī rawḍatin yuḥ'barūna
wa-ammā alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā waliqāi al-ākhirati fa-ulāika fī al-ʿadhābi muḥ'ḍarūna
fasub'ḥāna al-lahi ḥīna tum'sūna waḥīna tuṣ'biḥūna
walahu al-ḥamdu fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi waʿashiyyan waḥīna tuẓ'hirūna
yukh'riju al-ḥaya mina al-mayiti wayukh'riju al-mayita mina al-ḥayi wayuḥ'yī al-arḍa baʿda mawtihā wakadhālika tukh'rajūna
wamin āyātihi an khalaqakum min turābin thumma idhā antum basharun tantashirūna
wamin āyātihi an khalaqa lakum min anfusikum azwājan litaskunū ilayhā wajaʿala baynakum mawaddatan waraḥmatan inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yatafakkarūna
wamin āyātihi khalqu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-ikh'tilāfu alsinatikum wa-alwānikum inna fī dhālika laāyātin lil'ʿālimīna
wamin āyātihi manāmukum bi-al-layli wal-nahāri wa-ib'tighāukum min faḍlihi inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yasmaʿūna
wamin āyātihi yurīkumu al-barqa khawfan waṭamaʿan wayunazzilu mina al-samāi māan fayuḥ'yī bihi al-arḍa baʿda mawtihā inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yaʿqilūna
wamin āyātihi an taqūma al-samāu wal-arḍu bi-amrihi thumma idhā daʿākum daʿwatan mina al-arḍi idhā antum takhrujūna
walahu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kullun lahu qānitūna
wahuwa alladhī yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yuʿīduhu wahuwa ahwanu ʿalayhi walahu al-mathalu al-aʿlā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu

ḍaraba lakum mathalan min anfusikum hal lakum min mā malakat aymānukum min shurakāa fī mā razaqnākum fa-antum fīhi sawāon takhāfūnahum kakhīfatikum anfusakum kadhālika nufaṣṣilu al-āyāti liqawmin yaʿqilūna
bali ittabaʿa alladhīna ẓalamū ahwāahum bighayri ʿil'min faman yahdī man aḍalla al-lahu wamā lahum min nāṣirīna
fa-aqim wajhaka lilddīni ḥanīfan fiṭ'rata al-lahi allatī faṭara al-nāsa ʿalayhā lā tabdīla likhalqi al-lahi dhālika al-dīnu al-qayimu walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
munībīna ilayhi wa-ittaqūhu wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata walā takūnū mina al-mush'rikīna
mina alladhīna farraqū dīnahum wakānū shiyaʿan kullu ḥiz'bin bimā ladayhim fariḥūna
wa-idhā massa al-nāsa ḍurrun daʿaw rabbahum munībīna ilayhi thumma idhā adhāqahum min'hu raḥmatan idhā farīqun min'hum birabbihim yush'rikūna
liyakfurū bimā ātaynāhum fatamattaʿū fasawfa taʿlamūna
am anzalnā ʿalayhim sul'ṭānan fahuwa yatakallamu bimā kānū bihi yush'rikūna
wa-idhā adhaqnā al-nāsa raḥmatan fariḥū bihā wa-in tuṣib'hum sayyi-atun bimā qaddamat aydīhim idhā hum yaqnaṭūna
awalam yaraw anna al-laha yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yu'minūna
faāti dhā al-qur'bā ḥaqqahu wal-mis'kīna wa-ib'na al-sabīli dhālika khayrun lilladhīna yurīdūna wajha al-lahi wa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
wamā ātaytum min riban liyarbuwā fī amwāli al-nāsi falā yarbū ʿinda al-lahi wamā ātaytum min zakatin turīdūna wajha al-lahi fa-ulāika humu al-muḍ'ʿifūna
al-lahu alladhī khalaqakum thumma razaqakum thumma yumītukum thumma yuḥ'yīkum hal min shurakāikum man yafʿalu min dhālikum min shayin sub'ḥānahu wataʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
ẓahara al-fasādu fī al-bari wal-baḥri bimā kasabat aydī al-nāsi liyudhīqahum baʿḍa alladhī ʿamilū laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
qul sīrū fī al-arḍi fa-unẓurū kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu alladhīna min qablu kāna aktharuhum mush'rikīna
fa-aqim wajhaka lilddīni al-qayimi min qabli an yatiya yawmun lā maradda lahu mina al-lahi yawma-idhin yaṣṣaddaʿūna
man kafara faʿalayhi kuf'ruhu waman ʿamila ṣāliḥan fali-anfusihim yamhadūna
liyajziya alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti min faḍlihi innahu lā yuḥibbu al-kāfirīna
wamin āyātihi an yur'sila al-riyāḥa mubashirātin waliyudhīqakum min raḥmatihi walitajriya al-ful'ku bi-amrihi walitabtaghū min faḍlihi walaʿallakum tashkurūna
walaqad arsalnā min qablika rusulan ilā qawmihim fajāūhum bil-bayināti fa-intaqamnā mina alladhīna ajramū wakāna ḥaqqan ʿalaynā naṣru al-mu'minīna

al-lahu alladhī yur'silu al-riyāḥa fatuthīru saḥāban fayabsuṭuhu fī al-samāi kayfa yashāu wayajʿaluhu kisafan fatarā al-wadqa yakhruju min khilālihi fa-idhā aṣāba bihi man yashāu min ʿibādihi idhā hum yastabshirūna
wa-in kānū min qabli an yunazzala ʿalayhim min qablihi lamub'lisīna
fa-unẓur ilā āthāri raḥmati al-lahi kayfa yuḥ'yī al-arḍa baʿda mawtihā inna dhālika lamuḥ'yī al-mawtā wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
wala-in arsalnā rīḥan fara-awhu muṣ'farran laẓallū min baʿdihi yakfurūna
fa-innaka lā tus'miʿu al-mawtā walā tus'miʿu al-ṣuma al-duʿāa idhā wallaw mud'birīna
wamā anta bihādi al-ʿum'yi ʿan ḍalālatihim in tus'miʿu illā man yu'minu biāyātinā fahum mus'limūna
al-lahu alladhī khalaqakum min ḍaʿfin thumma jaʿala min baʿdi ḍaʿfin quwwatan thumma jaʿala min baʿdi quwwatin ḍaʿfan washaybatan yakhluqu mā yashāu wahuwa al-ʿalīmu al-qadīru
wayawma taqūmu al-sāʿatu yuq'simu al-muj'rimūna mā labithū ghayra sāʿatin kadhālika kānū yu'fakūna
waqāla alladhīna ūtū al-ʿil'ma wal-īmāna laqad labith'tum fī kitābi al-lahi ilā yawmi al-baʿthi fahādhā yawmu al-baʿthi walākinnakum kuntum lā taʿlamūna
fayawma-idhin lā yanfaʿu alladhīna ẓalamū maʿdhiratuhum walā hum yus'taʿtabūna
walaqad ḍarabnā lilnnāsi fī hādhā al-qur'āni min kulli mathalin wala-in ji'tahum biāyatin layaqūlanna alladhīna kafarū in antum illā mub'ṭilūna
kadhālika yaṭbaʿu al-lahu ʿalā qulūbi alladhīna lā yaʿlamūna
fa-iṣ'bir inna waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqun walā yastakhiffannaka alladhīna lā yūqinūna
